Entries.Introduction: Oh... You're that new farmer {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{GenericNoun}} }} }}, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.
